name: Konae-chan no Dokidoki Penguin Kazoku
overview: A Downloadable Event Game. It stars Konae and was distributed as a tie in to the Radio Program "If Tomorrow Comes...". The premise is to cross a freezing body of water by jumping across rows of glaciers without falling into the water. Points are awarded based on the number of penguins collected. Challenge increases over the course of five levels as more traps are added.
